file_content.text: You saved my life. Saved it.
No need to say a thing. I got a very polite holo from the chief enforcer. Very polite. And here, my good mercenary, are your credits.
The sooner the chief enforcer sees I mean business, the sooner I can make Nem'ro happy.
You! Yes. Oh yes. Oh, saved. Of course.
Nem'ro the Bounteous takes me from the swamp, yes? He gives me new name, new job. He makes me Morsel the Administrator!
Nem'ro orders me to keep work camp enforcers in line, but they hired to bully Evocii--they laugh at me!
Just tell me who you need dead and how much it's worth to you.
You need me to kill someone?
You tell people your name is Morsel and expect them to respect you?
Nem'ro didn't think it was funny. There was ceremony and everything! But those work camp enforcers respect nothing!
We talking about gunplay or just a stern talking to?
Enforcers hard to hire, harder to keep. So they think they can do as please. But we can't kill them....
Go to work camp. Wave your gun in chief enforcer's face. Make him see Morsel no one to laugh at, and I have stack of credits for you.
Sometimes being honored isn't all it should be.
